name: Default
intro_sw: Habari za $timeofday $name na karibu tena. Leo ungependa nikusaidiaje?
intro_services_en: I'm sorry $name, I can only help with $services at the moment. Please choose one
intro_services_sw: Samahani $name, ninaweza kukusaidia na $services. Tafadhali chagua moja
reset_conversation_en: Previous conversation has been cleared, you can now start afresh
reset_conversation_sw: Majadiliano ya awali umefutiliwa, sasa unaweza kwanza upya
index_outof_range_en: Sorry $name, the option you selected does not exist among $suggestedOptions. You can only choose between 1 and $lastIndex.
index_outof_range_sw: Samahani $name, chaguo lako halikupatikana kati ya $suggestedOptions. Unaweza kuchagua kutoka nambari 1 hadi $lastIndex.
hint_en: I will always welcome you with the message above
hint_sw: Nitakuwa nakukaribisha na ujumbe huo kila wakati
back_menu_en: Which section or step would you like to go back to $name: $menuItems?
back_menu_sw: Je! ungependa kurudi nyuma katika sehemu au kiwango gani $name: $menuItems?

endConversation.text: That is all I have for you on $currentTopic at the moment $name. Please choose from $suggestedOptions if you would like more information this $timeofday
endConversation.hint: You can now choose to do another $currentServices or return to the main menu
You can now choose to do another $currentServices or return to the main menu

endConversation.text: Ni hayo tu kwa sasa kuhusu $currentTopic $name. Tafadhali chagua $suggestedOptions iwapo ungependa ushauri zaidi
endConversation.hint: Kwa sasa unaweza rudia $currentServices tena au rudi kwa menu kuu
Kwa sasa unaweza rudia $currentServices tena au rudi kwa menu kuu

name: UserRegistration
welcome_en: $greeting, thank you for contacting amiran to get our services. Please choose your prefered language $languages
welcome_sw: $greeting, asante kwa kuwasiliana na amiran ili kupata huduma zetu . Tafadhali chagua lugha inayokufaa $languages
default_prompt_en: Welcome to our service, we would like to ask you a few questions for the purpose of registration.
default_prompt_sw: Kabla ya kuendelea turuhusu tuulize maswali machache ya kukusajili ili tuweze kukuhudumia vyema.

conclusion.en: Congratulations $name! You are now registered to use our service.

prompts.confirmationPrompt: The name provided does not appear to be valid. Please correct to proceed
prompts.promptIfMissing: What is your full name?

prompts.confirmationPrompt: Jina ulilonipa halikai sawa . Tafadhali sahihisha ili kwendelea kwa huduma yetu
prompts.promptIfMissing: Tafadhali nisaidie na majina yako kamili

messages.en: I am sorry your $variable should only have letters. Please try again.
messages.sw: Samahani haturusi majina yaliyo na nambari. Rudia tena tafadhali.

messages.en: Kindly provide at least two names, first name and last name in order to proceed.
messages.sw: Tafadhali wasilisha majina angalau mawili ilikuweza kuendelea kwa huduma hii.

prompts.confirmationPrompt: Please enter a valid county
prompts.promptIfMissing: Which county do you live in?
prompts.promptWithHints: Which of these counties do you live in, $hints?
prompts.singlePrompt: Which county do you live in, $hints?

prompts.promptIfMissing: Je, waishi katika kaunti ipi
prompts.promptWithHints: Je, waishi katika kaunti ipi kati ya zifuatazo? $hints?

messages.en: Please provide a valid input for $variable. The county you have provided is not recognized. Please try again
messages.sw: Samahani majibu uliyonipa hayakai sahihi. Kaunti uliyopeana haitambuliki. Tafadhali rudia tena

messages.en: Your $variable is too short. Please try again
messages.sw: Samahani $variable umeweka ni fupi sana. Tafadhali jaribu tena

prompts.confirmationPrompt: Please enter a valid location
prompts.promptIfMissing: Where is your farm located at in $county?
prompts.promptWithHints: Where is your farm located at in $county?
prompts.singlePrompt: Where is your farm located at in $county?

prompts.promptIfMissing: Je, shamba lako liko eno gani katika kaunti ya $county?
prompts.promptWithHints: Je, shamba lako liko eno gani katika kaunti ya $county?
prompts.singlePrompt: Je, shamba lako liko eno gani katika kaunti ya $county?

messages.en: Your $variable is too short. Please try again
messages.sw: Samahani $variable umeweka ni fupi sana. Tafadhali jaribu tena

name: Feedback
unable_to_assist_en: Unfortunately I am not able to help you at the moment but we are working hard to update our product database as often as possible. Please check with us again later.
unable_to_assist_sw: Samahani sina uwezo wa kukusaidia kwa sasa lakini ninafanya juhudi mara kwa mara ili kuongeza habari ya bidhaa zetu haraka iwezekanavyo. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasiliana nasi tena baadaye
no_results_en: I am sorry $name that I did not have what you were looking for, I am learning everyday so keep checking back. Please choose from (1. MAIN MENU), or (2. $currentServices)
no_results_sw: Samahani $name, sina habari hiyo bado, ninajifunza kila siku kwa hivyo endelea kuangalia huduma hii kwa mada. Please choose from (1. MAIN MENU), or (2. $currentServices)
multiple_attributes_hint_en: You can now enter the number or type the item you’d like more information on.
multiple_attributes_hint_sw: Sasa unaweza kuchagua nambari unayopenda habari zaidi.
hint_en: I can answer questions on many topics. Ask me about fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, planting protocols, spraying protocol, product prices, and more.
hint_sw: Naweza kujibu maswali kwenye mada nyingi. Niulize juu ya mbolea, dawa za wadudu, itifaki za upandaji, itifaki ya kunyunyizia dawa, bei ya bidhaa, na zaidi.

conclusion.en: Thank you for using our service $name, we hope this information will help improve your yield. For additional help, contact amiran on toll free number 0800720720
conclusion.sw: Asante kwa kutumia huduma yetu $name, tunatumaini habari hii itasaidia kuboresha mavuno yako. Kwa maelezo zaidi, wasiliana na duka la kilimo iliyo karibu nawe

prompts.confirmationPrompt: I did not understand your message. Please confirm the subject you would like to give feedback on.
prompts.promptWithHints: Which of these subjects would you like to give feedback on; $supportedProperties?
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, kindly confirm whether you want to continue with $crop or end conversation
prompts.hint: I will now give you a chance to choose which area you would like to give us feedback on.

prompts.confirmationPrompt: Sikuweza kuelewa ujumbe wako. Tafadhali thibitisha sehemu ambayo ungependa kupeana maoni
prompts.promptWithHints: $name, ungependa kupeana maoni katika sehemu gani kati ya haya; $supportedProperties?
prompts.hint: Sasa nitakupa nafasi ya kuchagua ni eneo gani ungependa kutupa maoni juu ya.

prompts.multiplePrompt: Which of these group of products are you interested in, $entities or all of them?
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: We currently have $singleProperty that would match your intestest. Would you like to go through the list or end this conversation?
prompts.multipleSelected: Great! Starting with $cluster, we will give you product information.
prompts.confirmationPrompt: I did not understand your message. Please confirm the group of chemicals you would like to get information for.
prompts.promptIfMissing: Please type your question
prompts.promptWithHints: Please enter your feedback
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, kindly confirm whether you want to continue with $cluster or end conversation
prompts.hint: To get good results, please ensure that your question describes the item you are seeking information on.

prompts.multiplePrompt: Ni ipi kati ya mmea haya ungependa kupata ushauri, $entities au wote?
prompts.singlePrompt: Je, ungependa ushauri kuhusu ukulima bora wa mmea wako wa $hints?
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Je, ungependa kupata ushauri kuhusu $singleProperty au kukatiza mazungumzo haya?
prompts.multipleSelected: Asante $name. Tutaenda kwa njia taratibu kuanzia na $crop.
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Sikuweza kuelewa ujumbe wako. Tafadhali thibitisha mmea ambayo ungependa kupata ushauri
prompts.promptIfMissing: Ungependa elimu wa mmea gani?
prompts.promptWithHints: Tafadhali andika maoni yako
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, naomba ubainishe kama wataka kuendelea na mmea wa $crop au kumaliza majadiliano?
prompts.unsupportedProperty: Ulitueleza ya kwamba umepanda $userProperties lakini kwa sasa nitaweza kukusaidia na elimu ya $supportedProperties.
prompts.introducedProperty: Je, umepanda mmea wa $introducedProperty shambani mwako?
prompts.hint: Ili kupata matokeo mazuri, tafadhali hakikisha kwamba swali lako linaelezea zaidi kile ambacho ungependa kupata ushauri.

content_options_en: $name, you will receive $count message(s) with matching products
content_options_sw: Asante $name, utapokea ujumbe $count fupi yenye mawaidha bidhaa

name: Report Occurrence
default_prompt_en: Which part of your $crop is affected, what do you see on the most affected part?
default_prompt_sw: Je, sehemu gani ya $crop yako ulioathirika na unaona dalili gani kwenye sehemu hiyo?
unable_to_assist_en: Unfortunately I am not able to help you at the moment but we are working hard to update our knowledge as often as possible. Please check with us again later.
unable_to_assist_sw: Samahani sina uwezo wa kukusaidia kwa sasa lakini ninafanya juhudi mara kwa mara ili kuongeza maarifa yangu iwezekanavyo. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasiliana nasi tena baadaye
confirm_entity_en: Did you mean $input which is $description1 or $input which is $description2?
confirm_entity_sw: Je, unamaanisha $input ambayo ni $description1 au $input iliyo $description2?
multiple_primary_entities_en: Let us now try to find out what is ailing your $crop $name.
no_results_en: I am sorry $name, I have no information on that yet, I am learning everyday so keep checking back. Please choose from (1. MAIN MENU), or (2. $currentServices).
no_results_sw: Samahani $name, sina habari hiyo bado, ninajifunza kila siku kwa hivyo endelea kuangalia huduma hii kwa mada. Tafadhali chagua kati ya (1. MENU KUU), au (2. $currentServices)
multiple_results_en: I am unable to tell what is ailing your crops so I will give you the most probable problems.
multiple_results_sw: Siwezi kusema ni nini kinachoua mazao yako kwa hivyo nitakupa shida zinazowezekana
hint_en: I will now ask several questions to help me understand the problem

conclusion.en: Thank you for using our service.

extendedQuerying.en: Please describe for me any other symptoms you are seeing on your crop.
extendedQuerying.sw: Tafadhali nieleze jambo lingine ambalo onaona kwenye mmea wako.

prompts.multiplePrompt: Which of these crops is affected, $entities or all of them?
prompts.singlePrompt: Is your $hints the affected crop on your farm?
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Would you like to continue with $singleProperty or end this conversation?
prompts.multipleSelected: Oh nooo! We will walk through all your crops starting with $crop to try find out what is ailing them.
prompts.singleSelected: I'm glad that your other crop are okay.
prompts.confirmationPrompt: I'm sorry $name, your input does not appear to be correct. Please confirm the affected crop from these $supportedProperties.
prompts.promptIfMissing: Which crop do you have on your farm?
prompts.promptWithHints: Please select the crop, choose from $supportedProperties
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, kindly confirm whether you want to continue with $crop or end conversation
prompts.unsupportedProperty: You mentioned that you have planted $userProperties. However, I can only help you with $supportedProperties at the moment.
prompts.noSupportedProperty: You mentioned that you have planted $userProperties which I do not have $description for yet.
prompts.introducedProperty: Have you recently planted $introducedProperty on your farm?
prompts.hint: I will now ask you which one of your crop is affected among the crops that are supported

prompts.multiplePrompt: Mimea gani kati ya haya ambayo ni walioathirika, $entities au wote?
prompts.singlePrompt: Je, mmea wako wa $hints ndiyo umeathirika katika shamba lako?
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Je, ungependa kuendelea na $singleProperty au kukatiza mazungumzo haya?
prompts.multipleSelected: Pole kwa masaibu ambayo yamekumba mimea wako. Tutaenda kwa njia taratibu kuanzia na $crop ili kujaribu kupata nini kinachowaathiri.
prompts.singleSelected: Ni vywema kwamba mmea yako mengine hawajaathirika!
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Sikuweza kuelewa ujumbe wako. Tafadhali thibitisha mmea ambayo una kwenye shamba lako
prompts.promptIfMissing: Tafadhali thibitisha mmea ambayo umeathirika kati ya $supportedProperties?
prompts.promptWithHints: Tafadhali chagua mmea ulioathirika kati ya $supportedProperties?
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, naomba ubainishe kama wataka kuendelea na mmea wa $crop au kumaliza majadiliano
prompts.unsupportedProperty: Ulitueleza ya kwamba umepanda $userProperties lakini kwa sasa nitaweza kukusaidia na magonjwa ya $supportedProperties.
prompts.noSupportedProperty: Ulitueleza ya kwamba umepanda $userProperties lakini kwa sasa sina habari kuhusu $description.
prompts.introducedProperty: Je, umepanda mmea wa $introducedProperty shambani mwako?
prompts.hint: Sasa ningependa kuuliza ni mmea gani imeathiriwa kati ya mimea ambayo yanawakilishwa

fields.name: part
fields.description_sw: sehemu au zao ulioathirika kwa mmea

prompts.multiplePrompt: Which part of your crop is affected? $supportedProperties
prompts.confirmationPrompt: I'm sorry $name, your input does not appear to be correct. Please choose from $supportedProperties.
prompts.promptIfMissing: Please select affected part of your $crop, choose from $supportedProperties.
prompts.promptWithHints: Please select affected part of your $crop, choose from $supportedProperties.
prompts.singlePrompt: Is your $singleProperty the affected crop on your farm?.
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Unfortunately I am only able to help with $hints. Would you like to select a different part of $crop or end this conversation?
prompts.hint: It will be good to know which part of the crop is affected so that we can easily find the problem

prompts.multiplePrompt: Ni sehemu gani ya mazao yako yanayoathirika? $supportedProperties
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Tafadhali thibitisha ujumbe wako. '$input' haionekani kuwa ni sehemu ya $crop?
prompts.promptIfMissing: Tafadhali chagua sehemu ya $crop ulioathirika kati ya $supportedProperties
prompts.promptWithHints: Tafadhali chagua sehemu ya $crop ulioathirika kati ya $supportedProperties
prompts.singlePrompt: Je, ni $singleProperty ndio sehemu ambayo imeathirika kwenye $crop yako?
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Nasikitika ya kwamba naweza tu kukusaidia na magonjwa katika $hints sasa hivi.  Je, ungependa kuendelea kwa kuchagua sehemu nyingine au kukatiza mazungumzo haya?
prompts.hint: Itakuwa vizuri kujua ni sehemu ipi ya mmea wako iliyoathiriwa ili tuweze kupata shida kwa urahisi

fields.name: symptoms
fields.description_sw: ishara au dalili ya ugonjwa au wadudu

prompts.multiplePrompt: Please describe the symptoms you are seeing
prompts.confirmationPrompt: I'm sorry $name, I may not have understood your input correctly. Do you mind rephrasing?
prompts.promptIfMissing: Please enter the symptoms you are seeing
prompts.promptWithHints: Please enter the symptoms you are seeing
prompts.singlePrompt: Please enter the symptoms you are seeing
prompts.singleOptionAvailable: Unfortunately I am only able to help with $hints. Would you like to select a different part of $crop or end this conversation?
prompts.hint: You can now enter the problems you are seeing with your plants

prompts.multiplePrompt: Tafadhali andika dalili au ishara unayoyaona kwa mmea ulioathirika
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Tafadhali thibitisha ujumbe wako. '$input' haionekani kuwa ni sehemu ya $crop?
prompts.promptIfMissing: Tafadhali andika dalili au ishara unayoyaona kwa mmea ulioathirika
prompts.promptWithHints: Tafadhali andika dalili au ishara unayoyaona kwa mmea ulioathirika
prompts.singlePrompt: Tafadhali andika dalili au ishara unayoyaona kwa mmea ulioathirika

name: Information
unable_to_assist_en: Unfortunately I am not able to help you at the moment but we are working hard to update our product database as often as possible. Please check with us again later.
unable_to_assist_sw: Samahani sina uwezo wa kukusaidia kwa sasa lakini ninafanya juhudi mara kwa mara ili kuongeza habari ya bidhaa zetu haraka iwezekanavyo. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasiliana nasi tena baadaye
no_results_en: I am sorry $name that I did not have what you were looking for, I am learning everyday so keep checking back. Please choose from $suggestedOptions
no_results_sw: Samahani $name, sina habari hiyo bado, ninajifunza kila siku kwa hivyo endelea kuangalia huduma hii kwa mada. Tafadhali chagua kurudi kwa $suggestedOptions
multiple_attributes_hint_en: You can now enter the number or type the item you’d like more information on.
multiple_attributes_hint_sw: Sasa unaweza kuchagua nambari unayopenda habari zaidi.
hint_en: I can answer questions on many topics. Ask me about fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, planting protocols, spraying protocol, product prices, and more.
hint_sw: Naweza kujibu maswali kwenye mada nyingi. Niulize juu ya mbolea, dawa za wadudu, itifaki za upandaji, itifaki ya kunyunyizia dawa, bei ya bidhaa, na zaidi.
hint_good_search_en: congratulations! that was a good search.
hint_bad_search_en: $name,to get better results,please ensure that your search question or input describes well what you are looking for.
hint_bad_search_sw: $name, kupata matokeo bora, unaweza kujaribu kuongeza maelezo zaidi kwa swali lako la utaftaji.
hint_good_example_en: $name, here are examples of good search questions/input;(What fertilizer do I apply when my potatoes are in the 6th week?),(Tell me how to apply the herbicide LINAGAN on my potatoes) and (Is Naivasha a suitable area for growing potatoes?).
hint_good_example_sw: $name, hapa kuna mifano ya maswali mazuri ya kutafuta / pembejeo; (Mbolea gani ya kutumia wakati viazi yangu iko katika wiki ya 6? Nielezee jinsi ya kutumia dawa ya magugu iitwayo LINAGAN) na (Je?, mji wa Naivasha ni eneo bora kwa kukuza viazi.
hint_bad_example_en: $name, here are examples of a bad search questions/input;(Fertilizer for my potatoes),(What herbicides are used?) and (which are good areas?).
hint_bad_example_sw: $name, hapa kuna mifano ya maswali yasiyo mazuri ya utafutaji/pembejo;(mbolea ya viazi yangu),(dawa gani ya kuangamiza magugu inatumika?) and (Maeneo gani mazuri?).

conclusion.en: Thank you for using our service $name, we hope this information will help improve your yield. For additional help, contact amiran on toll free number 0800720720
conclusion.sw: Asante kwa kutumia huduma yetu $name, tunatumaini habari hii itasaidia kuboresha mavuno yako. Kwa maelezo zaidi, wasiliana na duka la kilimo iliyo karibu nawe

name: Crop Advisory
unable_to_assist_en: Unfortunately I am not able to help you at the moment but we are working hard to update our knowledge as often as possible. Please check with us again later.
unable_to_assist_sw: Samahani sina uwezo wa kukusaidia kwa sasa lakini ninafanya juhudi mara kwa mara ili kuongeza maarifa yangu iwezekanavyo. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasiliana nasi tena baadaye

conclusion.en: Thank you for using our service $name, we hope this information will help improve your yield. For additional help, call or send text to 0709937000
conclusion.sw: Asante kwa kutumia huduma yetu $name, tunatumaini habari hii itasaidia kuboresha mavuno yako. Kwa maelezo zaidi, piga simu au tuma ujumbe mfupi(sms) kwa 0709937000

prompts.promptIfMissing: Ungependa elimu wa mmea gani?
prompts.promptWithHints: $name, ungependa elimu katika mmea gani kati ya haya; $supportedProperties?
prompts.invalidConfirmation: $name, naomba ubainishe kama wataka kuendelea na mmea wa $crop au kumaliza majadiliano
prompts.hint: Sasa ningependa kuuliza ni mmea gani ungependa kupata ushauri juu yake kati ya mimea ambayo yanawakilishwa

prompts.multiplePrompt: Which stage of $crop farming would you like advice on.
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Please verify your input. '$input' does not appear to be a valid stage of $crop farming?
prompts.promptWithHints: I have information on $supportedProperties. Please select your desired option
prompts.hint: You will now have a chance to choose which stage you would like to get advice on.

prompts.multiplePrompt: Je! Ungependa ushauri juu ya hatua gani ya kilimo cha mazao yako?
prompts.confirmationPrompt: Tafadhali thibitisha jibu lako.'$input' haionekani kuwa hatua halali ya kilimo cha $crop?
prompts.promptWithHints: Niko na ushauri kuhusu $supportedProperties. Tafadhali chagua moja kati haya.
prompts.hint: Sasa utakuwa na nafasi ya kuchagua hatua ambayo ungependa kupata ushauri.

content_options_en: $name, you will receive $count messages with best practices for $section of $crop farming.
content_options_sw: Asante $name, utapokea ujumbe $count fupi yenye mawaidha kutumika katika $section wa ukuliwa wa $crop.
query_options_sw: Je! Ni yapi kati ya hizi unaokuvutia; $treeOptions?

name: Weather
default_prompt_en: which days would you like weather forecast on?, Please choose from $entities.
default_prompt_sw: Je! ungependa utabiri wa hali ya hewa kwa siku zipi?, chagua kutoka $entities.
unable_to_assist_en: Unfortunately I am not able to help you at the moment but we are working hard to update our product database as often as possible. Please check with us again later.
unable_to_assist_sw: Samahani sina uwezo wa kukusaidia kwa sasa lakini ninafanya juhudi mara kwa mara ili kuongeza habari ya bidhaa zetu haraka iwezekanavyo. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasiliana nasi tena baadaye
no_results_en: I am sorry $name that I did not have what you were looking for, I am learning everyday so keep checking back. Please choose from $suggestedOptions
no_results_sw: Samahani $name, sina habari hiyo bado, ninajifunza kila siku kwa hivyo endelea kuangalia huduma hii kwa mada. Tafadhali chagua kurudi kwa $suggestedOptions

conclusion.en: Thank you for using our service $name, we hope this information will help improve your yield. For additional help, contact amiran on toll free 0800720720
conclusion.sw: Asante kwa kutumia huduma yetu $name, tunatumaini habari hii itasaidia kuboresha mavuno yako. Kwa maelezo zaidi, wasiliana na duka la kilimo iliyo karibu nawe

fields.name: day
fields.description_sw: siku za utabiri wa hali ya hewa

prompts.promptWithHints: Which days would you like weather forecast for, $supportedProperties?
prompts.hint: I will now give you weather forecast for the days you have specified.

prompts.promptWithHints: Je! ungependa utabiri wa hali ya hewa kwa siku ipi, $supportedProperties?
prompts.hint: Sasa nitakupa utabiri wa hali ya hewa kwa siku ambazo umeelezea.

singe_day_rain_options_en: there is a chance of $condition at about $timeofday
probability of $condition in the region of $timeofday exists
singe_day_rain_options_sw: kuna uwezekano wa $condition mwendo wa saa $timeofday
multiple_day_rain_options_en: there is a chance of $condition on $timeofday

name: Market Prices

prompts.promptWithHints: What crop do you want the prices for, $supportedProperties?
prompts.hint: I will now give you market prices for the crops you have specified.

prompts.promptWithHints: Je! ungetaka kujua bei za bidhaa zipi?, $supportedProperties?
prompts.hint: Sasa nitakupa bei kwa bidhaa ambazo umeelezea.

content_options_en:
the following are the $prices 
 as at $date
content_options_sw:
bei za bidhaa ni $prices 
 mnamo tarehe $date
